name: 2023 4th Asia Conference on Renewable Energy And Environmental Engineering
content: Paper Publication: Submissions will be reviewed by both the conference committees and IJESD editorial board, accepted papers will be recommended to International Journal of Environmental Science and Development for publication in a special issue, which will be indexed by Scopus, Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), CABI, DOAJ, Ulrich Periodicals Directory, Crossref, ProQuest, etc.
